section.heading: Tax abatements for housing in downtown – Rules.
section.text: The Mayor shall, pursuant to Subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, issue rules to implement §§ 47-860.01 through 47-860.03.".

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 7082(b) of Fiscal Year 2023 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-470, July 13, 2022, 69 DCR 008707).
